name: Klerb
description:
A game for the Brackeys game jam 2022, theme "It is not real".  Klerb is an endless runner game which you can play in your free time. Don't blame me for the graphics, they were the best I could do with html canvas and js.

Credit for the name 'Klerb' from Hederlunden at hederlunden.itch.io

Credit to Redline for the cover image

Credit to https://kenney.nl/ for all sounds except music

Music made by me: https://onlinesequencer.net/2610273

If you have played the game and don't care, skip the line in block caps.

DON'T READ ON UNLESS YOU WANT A SPOILER THAT RUINS THE GAME FOR YOU.

It fits the theme as the red obstacle is not real and is actually the key to winning.
